Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
BrowseVersesDelegate
BibleStudy::BrowseVersesModelThis class is an implementation of a model from the Qt Model/View framework for a tree view that is used to browse the verses of multiple translations
BibleStudy::CommandPerformSearchThis class represents a command that searches the translations for a given string
BibleStudy::ICommandThis class represents a generic command interface
BibleStudy::ISearchResultsThis class represents an interface for accumulating translation search results
BibleStudy::SearchResultsModelThis class is an implementation of a model from the Qt Model/View framework for a table view which displays the results of a search
BibleStudy::SearchResultsSerialThis class implements the ISearchResults interface using a serial linear search
BibleStudy::StarredVersesModelThis class is an implementation of a model from the Qt Model/View framework for a list view which represents the verses the user has starred
BibleStudy::StaticDescriptorInitializer_TranslationBuffer_2eproto
BibleStudy::TranslationThis class represents a specific translation of the Bible
BibleStudy::TranslationBuffer
BibleStudy::TranslationManagerThis class represents a collection of read-only translations
BibleStudy::TranslationNotFoundThis class represents an exception that is thrown when a Translation object of the given name is not found in the TranslationManager
BibleStudy::UIBibleStudyWidgetThis class is the GUI respresentation of the top level widget for the application
BibleStudy::UIBrowseVersesWidgetThis class is an implementation of a view from the Qt Model/View framework for a tree view that allows the user to browse the verses of all Translation objects
BibleStudy::UISearchResultsWidgetThis class is an implementation of a view from the Qt Model/View framework for a table view which displays the results of a text search
BibleStudy::UISearchWidgetThis class represents a collection of widgets which provide a text input field to input a search string and a button to start the search
BibleStudy::UIStarredVersesWidgetThis class is an implementation of a view from the Qt Model/View framework for a list view which represents the verses the user has starred
BibleStudy::UITextViewWidgetThis class respresents a text box that displays a collection of verses and allows the user to star, unstar a verse and navigate a translation
BibleStudy::VerseThis class represents a single verse in a Translation object
BibleStudy::VerseBuffer
BibleStudy::VerseDisplayThis class respresents the information necessary to display a given verse. This include the verse ID, the number of context verses, and Translation object
BibleStudy::VerseTreeItemThis class is used to represent a verse and its relationship to other verses in a Translation object that allow it to be displayed in a tree view
